title: Anyone having issue unable to log in to client now?
body: Everything was working fine this morning when i play. Now the client won't let me log in as it said unable to login queue. As i check server status, it seem everything is in working condition.

replies.body: yep keeps informing me incorrect password, which is incorrect. So yep, no login.
same problem. even reset my password and it's still not working.
I thought someone hacked into my account so i sent a forgot password recovery to LOL. please fix this is so frustrating,.
Hey guys, I'm not currently seeing any issues reaching the authentication servers on NA.  Is this still an issue or is everything okay now?
Quite a few of us having issue logging in last night. But it is working fine again after few hours.

Have same problem guys help me. it says username or password is incorrect. since like 3 hours. my account banned?

 Help me guys [;zzzzzzzzzzzzz
doesn't seem to be working for me :(
I have the same problem as you guys too.
Same here, unable to login, unable to connect to login queue.
